item.title: Trump blames Biden after GDP shrinks in first quarter, says growth will 'take a while'
item.description: President Donald Trump blamed his predecessor and defended his sweeping tariffs after new data showed the U.S. economy contracting last quarter.

item.title: Lars Klingbeil to become Germany's vice chancellor and finance minister, Social Democratic Party says
item.description: The Social Democratic Party's Lars Klingbeil has been tapped to become Germany's next finance minister in the incoming centrist coalition government.

item.title: Trump's first 100 days in photos
item.description: President Donald Trump has rolled out a tariff regime, pushed for mass deportations, empowered Elon Musk to slash the government and more.

item.title: Trump: 'I think we'll have a deal with India' on tariffs and trade
item.description: Trump's comments come after Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said the U.S. was "very close on India."

item.title: Trump complained to Bezos before Amazon said it scrapped idea to display tariff cost
item.description: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos has cozied up to President Donald Trump since the Republican won a second White House term.
